name: Into The Patty Tomb
description:
Rolin is back! (If you played the  The Patty Mix Up) and is now a well rounded chef working in Pattygonia. Just as life is going well, the king returns with a new quest for Rolin to find a "hidden object in the tombs".  To find the hidden object, you must find and collect beef patties to get through the doors of the tomb.

*Supports Keyboard and Mouse

*Controller Support Highly Recommended (Any Gamepad, DualShock 4 and Xbox One)
